Summary A Senior Technical Manager with in-depth experience in the Internet, Mobile, Telecommunication and Media industries.  
 
Massimo is a real product guy who is technical and can actually build stuff.  
 
He holds a Master of Science (M. Sc.) in Computer Science from the University of Milano, Italy and is Scrum Master certified. 
 
He has led cross-functional teams of highly talented individuals on multi-national projects across Europe, Asia, Australia and the Americas; he delivered on time many complex projects and programs which met the business objectives:  
 
• A major roll-out (Yahoo! News 2.0), released across five markets in Europe and supported the roll-out in non-EU countries as India and South East Asia. 
• Browser, Messaging, Security and DRM software components in many mobile phones approved by more than 30 operators world-wide. 
• A new line of ERP / CRM / BI products for the automotive industry, including the creation of an “early adopters” program to receive and incorporate the customers’ feedback, a "lessons learned" and a "partner enablement" certification and training program. 
 
He is a member of the Scrum and Agile Process Alliance (http://www.scrumalliance.org/)  
 
“I have a couple of small talents but foremost I am passionately curious and want to make an impact.” 
 
Specialties: Project and program management, Agile and lean methodologies, Scrum, Kanban, PMI, Process Definition and Improvement, 
Product management, Quality Assurance, 
Managing cross-functional and dispersed teams; 
Software Design & Development,  
Internet, Web and Mobile Technologies, 
Embedded / Real time systems, Internet Of Things,  
Mobile and Wireless Development, Android, iOS; 
User Experience, Man Machine Interface,
